title: 2nd Circuit Court of Appeals Just Opened the Door to Australian-Style Gun Ban | Politics
text:

On Monday, the Second Circuit Court of Appeals issued a decision on the New York SAFE Act. According to the Court, virtually all of the law, which clearly infringes on the rights of the people to keep and bear arms … Continue reading →
